server

Class ReiseContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ReiseContainer

  • public class ReiseContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents some kind of administration box inside the ReiseServer it could be very useful to have more of these things and split the Reise objects into category's, but that is not implemented by default.
    Author:
    erik heinisch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReiseContainer()
      Creates two ArrayList: one for Reise objects and one for the travel destinations.
      As last action the Constructor calls the this.laden() method to make sure that Reise Objects that existed in the last session are restored.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get´s a Reise object that fits to the given travel destination
      java.lang.String[] getReiseziele()
      Get´s all travel destinations
      void laden()
      Reads the file "reisen.txt".
      int size()
      Get´s the amount of journeys available in the ReiseContainer
      void speichern()
      Writes a save file "reisen.txt" in which all journeys and their values are stored.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Nothing important in here but it can be used for debugging

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReiseContainer

        public ReiseContainer()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates two ArrayList: one for Reise objects and one for the travel destinations.
        As last action the Constructor calls the this.laden() method to make sure that Reise Objects that existed in the last session are restored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • addReise

        public void addReise(java.lang.String ziel,
            Reise reise)
        Add´s a Reise and the inherent journey destination to the specific ArrayList´s
        Parameters:
        ziel - a String that represents the travel destination of the inherent Reise.
        reise - a Reise object that is inherent with ziel.

      • getReise

        public Reise getReise(java.lang.String ziel)
        Get´s a Reise object that fits to the given travel destination
        Parameters:
        ziel - a String that is used to find a matching Reise object in dieReisen, ziel is the destination of the journey to find
        Returns:
        a Reise object that was selected as matching for the parameter ziel.

      • getReiseziele

        public java.lang.String[] getReiseziele()
        Get´s all travel destinations
        Returns:
        a String[] that contains all travel destinations provided by the ReiseContainer

      • laden

        public void laden()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the file "reisen.txt". For each line of the file it creates one Reise add´s the travelers to them and finaly add´s the Reise into dieReisen. It is called automatically in the creation of an new ReiseContainer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • size

        public int size()
        Get´s the amount of journeys available in the ReiseContainer
        Returns:
        an Integer that represents the number of journeys administrated by the server.

      • speichern

        public void speichern()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a save file "reisen.txt" in which all journeys and their values are stored. speichern() is called automatically when the JVM shuts down, so the Server saves on its own.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Nothing important in here but it can be used for debugging
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        dateiname a String that represents nothing at all because I don´t need this method in my build and i did just use it for debugging, and to get a nice overview on what is in dieReisen
